scripts.say: Finally home... can't take it anymore... going to sleep...
Wait, Laffey, don't fall asleep just yet! The reconnaissance mission doesn't end until we're back in port!
Our original mission was just to scout the Mirror Sea. I didn't think we'd be found and have to fight. It's understandable to be tired.
Ahhh... I can't do it! I had no idea fighting those full-powered CPU clones would be so tiring...
The one that looked like Noire was so strong...
Why would the enemy have someone who looks exactly like Noire in her CPU form?
... My apologies. Even though that wasn't me, it seems that whatever took on my form has caused trouble for everyone.
Mhm... it's not Noire's fault. Surely it's the doing of the Mirror Sea...
Those attacks from the fake Black Heart are only possible when a CPU has full share power... I wonder if our data was somehow taken...
It'll be fine! We managed to chase them off and all, so everything will be okay!
That's true... Even though those fakes indeed had our powers, they were like puppets that fought without knowledge or experience. They should be straightforward to defeat.
Yup yup! As long as we work together, we can wrap this up!
Well... without enough share power, we won't be of much help.
... That's right... Perhaps this fatigue is also due to a lack of shares...
Because of that, we certainly had it rough as well.
Nep?! Blanc and Vert? You guys are here too?
Just the two of you don't instill a whole lot of confidence, so I decided to check in.
Histoire is currently investigating a way of getting home. There shouldn't be anything to worry about.
We encountered them during another reconnaissance mission... so we brought them over.
Thank you, Ayanami. Did you also run into your own clones?
Yes... With everyone's aid... we somehow managed to fight them back...
Frankly speaking, there's no way of utilizing our full power without shares.
Come to think of it, Akashi was looking for Nep-Nep and the others.
I've been listening, nya. It seems like the CPUs aren't able to wield their powers here, nya.
Akashi, did you find a solution?
It's quite simple, nya. When in Rome, do as the Romans do. All we need to do is to equip you CPUs with your own ship rigging!
This way, everyone can sortie together!
Wooah! Shiny new equipment! Gimme Gimme!
To think that something like this could be done... Akashi, can we equip these right now?
Hmm... I don't think I can make it tonight. Why don't you all get some rest, nya?
Akashi will have it done by the morning. Look forward to it, nya!
